blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms

Class MaterialShaderProgram<M extends Material>

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms.ShaderProgramBase
      • blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms.MaterialShaderProgram<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - The material that is used to load all uniforms to this programs shaders.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicShaderProgramBase

    public abstract class MaterialShaderProgram<M extends Material>
extends ShaderProgramBase
    The base of all shader programs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MaterialShaderProgram(VertexShader vertexShader, FragmentShader fragmentShader)
      Default constructor for creating a new instance of ShaderProgram.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void bindAttributes()
      An implementation of this method should bind all attributes ('in' variables) to a specified location using the member bindAttribute(attributeName, location).
      abstract void draw(Vao vao)
      The draw call specific to the vao.
      abstract void loadMaterialUniforms(M material)
      Loads all properties from the material to their corresponding uniform variables.
      abstract void loadTransformUniforms(Transform transform)
      Loads all uniform variables that are dependant on the transform of an instance that will be renderer.
      protected void validate()
      Binds the attributes ('in' variables) and validates this program.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MaterialShaderProgram

        public MaterialShaderProgram(VertexShader vertexShader,
                             FragmentShader fragmentShader)
        Default constructor for creating a new instance of ShaderProgram.
        Parameters:
        vertexShader - The vertex shader that will be used.
        fragmentShader - The fragment shader that will be used.

    • Method Detail

      • loadMaterialUniforms

        public abstract void loadMaterialUniforms(M material)
        Loads all properties from the material to their corresponding uniform variables.
        Parameters:
        material - The material of which the properties will be loaded into the uniform variables.

      • loadTransformUniforms

        public abstract void loadTransformUniforms(Transform transform)
        Loads all uniform variables that are dependant on the transform of an instance that will be renderer.
        Parameters:
        transform - The transform of the instance that will be rendered next.

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(Vao vao)
        The draw call specific to the vao. The Vao should be bound and unbound in this method as well.
        Parameters:
        vao - The vao that will be drawn.

      • bindAttributes

        protected abstract void bindAttributes()
        An implementation of this method should bind all attributes ('in' variables) to a specified location using the member bindAttribute(attributeName, location).

      • validate

        protected void validate()
        Description copied from class: ShaderProgramBase
        Binds the attributes ('in' variables) and validates this program.
        Overrides:
        validate in class ShaderProgramBase
